title: LEVERAGING VISUAL FOUNDATION MODEL FOR ECHOCARDIOGRAPHY WORKFLOW ENHANCEMENT

abstract: Background The vision foundation model,“Segment Anything (SAM),” promises to segment any objects in images. However, the performance of SAM on clinical echocardiography images has yet to be investigated and compared against the state …
